member.name: AUXCAPS
member.summary: The AUXCAPS structure describes the capabilities of an auxiliary output device.

member.name: AUXCAPS.wMid
member.summary: Manufacturer identifier for the device driver for the auxiliary audio device. Manufacturer identifiers are defined in Manufacturer and Product Identifiers.

member.name: AUXCAPS.wPid
member.summary: Product identifier for the auxiliary audio device. Currently, no product identifiers are defined for auxiliary audio devices.

member.name: AUXCAPS.vDriverVersion
member.summary: Version number of the device driver for the auxiliary audio device. The high-order byte is the major version number, and the low-order byte is the minor version number.

member.name: AUXCAPS.szPname
member.summary: Product name in a null-terminated string.

summary.para: Type of the auxiliary audio output:

listheader.description: Audio output from auxiliary input jacks.
Audio output from an internal CD-ROM drive.

summary.para: Describes optional functionality supported by the auxiliary audio device.

listheader.description: Supports separate left and right volume control.

summary.para: If a device supports volume changes, the AUXCAPS_VOLUME flag will be set. If a device supports separate volume changes on the left and right channels, both AUXCAPS_VOLUME and the AUXCAPS_LRVOLUME will be set.
